name: Stasis - Lost in a Nightmare
description:
Lost In a Nightmare is the first feature length album from Stasis since singer Julia Glenn joined the ranks in 2006. It is an awesome mix of powerful vocal melodies, anthem-induced hooks, and rhythms galore.

Stasis is:

Julia Glenn - vocals

Aaron Hallett - guitars

Joshua Guerrero - bass

Sean Montross - drums

The album features 12 tracks (all to be available soon)

1) Intro

2) The Life

3) Outside In

4) Counterfeit

5) Your Eyes

6) Relentless

7) Promises

8) Until I Die

9) Lost In A Nightmare

10) A Place Apart

11) Lady Elaine

12) LBE
